Source.Name: perl-file-sharedir-install
Source.Summary: Install read-only date files from Perl
Source.Description: File::ShareDir::Install allows you to install read-only data files from a distribution. It is a companion module to File::ShareDir, which allows you to locate these files after installation.

Package.Name: perl-file-sharedir-install

Package.Description: File::ShareDir::Install allows you to install read-only data files from a distribution. It is a companion module to File::ShareDir, which allows you to locate these files after installation.
